snippet.title: 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim — Accolades Trailer | Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
The acclaimed sci-fi epic 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim is better than ever on Nintendo Switch! 

See why it's the game critics can't stop talking about - and why they would *never* spoil it. 

Order now: atlus.com/13sentinels

Follow us:
Twitter: https://bit.ly/AtlusTW
Instagram: https://bit.ly/AtlusIG
Facebook: https://bit.ly/AtlusFB
